channel.title: [adding]thing to quest tabs [help please someone]
channel.description:
Hello,
I am trying to add thing to quest tabs these are the following things i would like sir,
PKZ = IT TELL YOUR PK POINTS
KILL = HOW MANY TIME YOU KILLED PEOPLE
DEATH = HOW MANY TIME YOU DIED
Who like to help me add my msn W36BA@HOTMAIL.COM will be happy thank you.

item.title: [adding]thing to quest tabs [help please someone]
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

[quote=“l0lc0pt3r, post:4, topic:402111”][quote author=$Nathan link=topic=499164.msg3650367#msg3650367 date=1309690506]
If it pi its client.java server sided.
Then ctrl + f:

public void process() {

After found you may see something like:

getPA().sendFrame126

If not your going to then need to add some of that in, so if you want pk points something like:

getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@Reward Points", 7334); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+magePoints+" ", 7336);

Thats what it is for my server, if you want a title that has players online you’re going to have to add this:

getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 640); //quest journal title

Private message me if you need any more help with this.
[/quote]

hes got it 100% dead on if its PI. if its delta then id reccomend using a search bar, i searched this topic and came up with about 20 results that work 100%…[/quote]Thats what I did but I thought I have spare time so I might aswell just post it.

Read full topic

If not your going to then need to add some of that in, so if you want pk points something like:

Thats what it is for my server, if you want a title that has players online you’re going to have to add this:

getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 640); //quest journal title

Private message me if you need any more help with this.[/quote]
